Context: The Young Centre for Performing Arts is the location of George Brown College's Theatre programs. It is situated in the Distillery District of Toronto, at 50 Tankhouse Lane, M5A 3C4. The contact details to arrange for a tour are (416) 415-5000, ext. 2167 or performingarts@georgebrown.ca. There are multiple ways to reach the Young Centre for the Performing Arts from subway stations: King streetcar east from King or St. Andrew stations, and No. 65 Parliament bus from Castle Frank station. The theatre is also accessible through parkopedia.ca for parking information. For more information about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and other related matters, sign up on the website. Additionally, the contact number for general inquiries is 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, and ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The land acknowledgment can also be learned from the website.
